snippet: Gilles Simon, seeded 26th, defeated fourth-seeded David Ferrer to become the first man at this United States Open to send a top-10 seed home, on a day when rain suspended play for about two hours.
abstract: Gilles Simon defeats David Ferrer in the third round of the United States Open tennis tournament; other Open matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon, seeded 26th, defeated fourth-seeded David Ferrer to become the first man at this United States Open to send a top-10 seed home, on a day when rain suspended play for about two hours.

headline.seo: U.S. Open 2014: Gilles Simon Ousts David Ferrer
headline.main: Men’s Draw Has Its First Major Surprise, and Event Has Its First Rain
headline.print_headline: Men’s Draw Has Its First Major Surprise, and Event Has Its First Rain
